impactPoints: Taught probability distributions and combinatorial methods applied to data science problems
Taught core CS foundations including algorithm complexity, graph and tree algorithms
Taught image processing and data visualization techniques, covering 2D/3D transformations and statistical graphics libraries (Matplotlib, Seaborn, ggplot2)
Researched RNA secondary structure prediction, building computational tools to support biological function discovery
Engineered high throughput HPC pipeline using SLURM job scheduling and graph isomorphism algorithms, processing 10,000+ RNA structures
Developed a responsive website using Node.js, Express, and EJS
Structured and organized site content to ensure clarity and ease of navigation
